channel.title: How do i change the coords of where i make a new acc
channel.description: how do i change the coords of where i make a new acc

item.title: How do i change the coords of where i make a new acc
item.dc:creator: @kpop kpop
item.description:
@kpop wrote:

For 508
Go to login.java

Search for

if (p.teleportToX == -1 && p.teleportToY == -1)

and right below that you’ll see something like…

 p.setCoords(3186, 3442, 0);

[i]change /i to where u want new players to spawn.

For 317
Go into player.java

Search for

absX = absY = -1; mapRegionX = mapRegionY = -1; currentX = currentY = 0; resetWalkingQueue(); }

right above that you’ll see something like…

heightLevel = 0; teleportToX = 2758; teleportToY = 2781;

change those coordinates to where you want the player to go

if u have 474/525 or any other type im not sure how to change it then.
Hope this helped.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change the coords of where i make a new acc
